title: Stencil - Spray Paint Type
content:
hey all, just wondering if anyone know what font this is.

Thanks!

- sye :)
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content:
sorry my computer is being silly...

[http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w88/varultz/gifts1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101117164904/http:/i174.photobucket.com/albums/w88/varultz/gifts1.jpg "http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w88/varultz/gifts1.jpg")

cheers

i found it! [http://www.dafont.com/barrio-30.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20101117164904/http:/www.dafont.com/barrio-30.font "http://www.dafont.com/barrio-30.font")

barrio 30 by stereo type

cheers!

ok... maybe no... while Barrio 30 is basically corret, it seems that it's 'over sprayed' especially in the G and T... is it a knock off? or is there a pro version somewhere? I tried looking at the stereo type website but had no luck there...

thanks
Did you consider it was an aereosol.

It's obviously had some photoshop work (or real-life paint) done on it, which would explain the discrepancies.

- Lex

I thought that too, at first, but on closer inspection in seems to be far to consistant... i'm trying to track down a pdf of the booklet it's from, when you see it used in other headings it becomes clear it's just type... well that's what i think anyway...

ok, so i tracked down the designer of the booklet i saw it in and he pointed me here: [http://www.sxc.hu/photo/458192](http://web.archive.org/web/20101117164904/http:/www.sxc.hu/photo/458192 "http://www.sxc.hu/photo/458192") so it was not a font, but barrio 30 is the font made from that pic.

cheers
